sentence.Network_en: The successful copywriter is a master of apposite and evocative verbal images.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个成功的广告撰稿人是一个知道如何用恰当而富有感染力的言语来描述形象的语言大师.

sentence.Network_en: Shares responsibility for the execution of all printed materials with copywriter.
sentence.Network_cn: 与文案共同负责执行印刷工作.

sentence.Network_en: I started out as an advertising copywriter and , you know, moved up the agency ladders.
sentence.Network_cn: 我一开始是从事广告文案撰写, 然后一路在公司里往上爬.

entry.def: A copywriter is a person whose job is to write the words for advertisements.

means.word_mean: 1. a person employed to write advertising or publicity copy

auth_sentence.content: So what can a fledgling scribe learn from a good copywriter?
auth_sentence.res_content: So what can a fledgling scribe learn from a good copywriter?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So what can a fledgling scribe learn from a good copywriter?

auth_sentence.content: People who want to express themselves effectively can learn a lot from the hard-won concision of the copywriter.
auth_sentence.res_content: People who want to express themselves effectively can learn a lot from the hard-won concision of the copywriter.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: People who want to express themselves effectively can learn a lot from the hard-won concision of the copywriter.

auth_sentence.content: In media where you have no typographer, photographer, illustrator or designer, the craft of the copywriter is important.
